eya wam iwuru pa‡∑äradeshaye dakunu kotasa sanwardhanayata rukulak wiya.walawa wam iwura sanwardhanaya yatathe hektayar 2900 ka wari marga paddhathiya wadi diyunu kirima da hektayar 1.100 ka nawa warimarga paddhathi idi kirima da japan naya aadhara yatathe 2001 wasaredi sidu kerini.japana naya aadhara yatathe udawalawa jalashaye wella punaruththapanaya sampurna kara athi athara nawa sanwardhana pa‡∑äradeshaye hektayar 5150 ka wari marga ha samajiya yatithala pahasukam sapayime katayuthu danatath ki‡∑ärayathmaka wemin pawathi.walawa wam iwura warimarga wadi diyunu kirime pa‡∑äradhana aramuna wanne wam iwura pa‡∑äradeshaye panshu saha jala sampath karyakshamawa ha pa‡∑ärashastha lesa bhawitha kirimata awasthawa salasena ayurin pa‡∑äradeshaye wari saha samaja yatithala pahasukam diyunu kara gowin wanija, krushikarmaya sandaha nambauru kirima ya.idam nathi pawulwalata idam labadima, wi ha anekuth aahara boga warga ha nishpadanaya wadi kirima, wyapruthi pa‡∑äradeshaye rakiya awastha sapayima, parisarika hani awama kirima, pa‡∑äradeshiya aarthikaya diyunu kirima magin dilindukama pitu dakima, anekuth aramunu athara we.udawalawa jalashaya pitawana ha ee sambandhitha nirmithayan punaruththapanaya kirima siyaluma gammanawalata widulibalaya sapayima, nadaththu ha meheyum upakarana sapayima, sampath karyakshama lesa bhawitha karamin wanija krushikarmayata nambauru karalima parisarika sanrakshanaya mehidi itu kerena karyayan weyi.padinchikaruwan sandaha adhyapana ha saukhya parawal widulibalaya ha jala sampadanaya, thapal wanija madhyasthana ha pa‡∑ärawahana pahasukam da athuluwa samajiya yatithala pahasukam adala aayathana samanga salasum kara sapaya denu atha.adiyara - 2 yatathe pa‡∑äradeshiya madhyasthanayak gammana madhyasthana dekak ha ga‡∑äramiya madhyasthana atak saha janapadikayanta sewaya salasima sandaha godanangili da idikere.warimarga sanwardhanaya salasum kirimedi pawathna jala sampathwala purna pariharanaya parisarayata dadi hani nopanawima guruthwa wari paddhathiya handunwadima pawathna waw paddhathiya uparima ayurin pa‡∑ärayojanayata ganima yana karunu salaka atha.walawe wyapruthiyehi dwithwa ala paddhathiya namin nawa warimarga ka‡∑äramayak da atha.
